title: I hate every new champion that gets released.
body:
They look so try-hard, and they come so fucking smug thinking they've been part of League of Legends since its release, like fuck you guys, you fucking League immigrants.

(Racist to League champions only).

replies.body: Ivern is so smug, I can't stand it.

> [{quoted}](name=amqwetts2147,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jl7VYXPd,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-04-05T02:35:09.782+0000)
>
> They look so try-hard, and they come so fucking smug thinking they&#039;ve been part of League of Legends since its release, like fuck you guys, you fucking League immigrants.
> 
> (Racist to League champions only).

The hell are you talking about?
I think he might have been making a joke? I can't really tell.

> [{quoted}](name=midnight oil24,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jl7VYXPd,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-04-05T11:46:06.389+0000)
>
> I think he might have been making a joke? I can't really tell.

But why is it in Story/Art/Sound
